alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 5:44AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Kimble and Mason Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 544 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Segovia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Junction, Mason, Art, Loyal Valley, Yates Crossing, Segovia, Hedwigs Hill, Hilda, South Llano River State Park, Us-87 Near The Mason- Gillespie County Line, Koockville, Us-83 Near The Kerr- Kimble County Line, I-10 Near The Kimble- Kerr County Line and The Intersection Of I-10 And Us 290. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 455 and 477. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
